name: ovine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to sheep: Research projects include studies of the ovine immune system. Dolly, the first ovine clone, caused a media sensation in the nineties.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is differentiated from other ovine lungworms by its larger size and straight tail.Contagious ovine digital dermatitis is a relatively new and highly infectious foot condition.What if sheep started running amok, feasting on human flesh and turning their victims into huge ovine zombies?
